sorcer.util

Interface ProtocolStream

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataProtocolStream, ServletProtocolStream

    public interface ProtocolStream

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the input and output streams.
      void done()
      Write a done mark.
      void flush()
      Flush the output stream.
      boolean isObjectStream() 
      String readEscapedLine()
      Reads the next line of text from this protocol input stream, and escape new line charachter.
      int readInt()
      Reads a signed 32-bit integer from this data input stream.
      String readLine()
      Reads the next line of text from this protocol input stream.
      void writeEscapedLine(String str)
      Writes a String with escaped line delimiters, and then finish the line.
      void writeInt(int v)
      Writes an 32-bit int to the underlying output stream.
      void writeLine(String str)
      Writes a String, and then finish the line.
      void writeObject(Object str)
